item.title: 中国出口管制针对的五种稀土是什么？
item.description: 中国周四表示，计划在其出口管制清单上再增加五种稀土元素和相关材料，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和习近平举行会谈之前加强对该行业的控制。【原文：China said on Thursday it planned to add five more rare earth elements and related materials to its export controls list, tightening its grip on the sector ahead of talks between Presidents Donald Trump and Xi Jinping.】

item.title: 巴西中央银行行长称暂停紧缩意味着利率水平将维持更长时间
item.description: 巴西央行货币政策主管尼尔顿-戴维（Nilton David）周四表示，决策者决定中断货币紧缩周期，这要求保持利率不变的时间比继续提高利率的时间更长。【原文：Brazil's central bank monetary policy director Nilton David said on Thursday that the decision by policymakers to interrupt the monetary tightening cycle requires keeping interest rates unchanged for longer than if they had continued raising them.】

item.title: 全球市场对加沙两年战争的反应
item.description: 以下五张图表显示了过去两年全球金融市场对以色列和哈马斯之间战争的波动反应。【原文：Below are five charts showing the volatile response of global financial markets to the war between Israel and Hamas over the last two years.】

item.title: 尽管食品价格下降，巴西 9 月通胀仍有所反弹
item.description: 统计机构巴西地理统计局（IBGE）周四公布的数据显示，尽管食品价格持续走低，巴西 9 月份的通胀率仍恢复了增长。【原文：Brazil's inflation resumed growth in September, despite the continuous easing in food prices, data from statistics agency IBGE showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国收紧出口管制后稀土矿商股价上涨
item.description: 稀土矿商的股票在周四早盘交易中上涨，此前中国收紧了对武器和电子行业至关重要的金属的出口管制，旨在限制向海外国防公司和半导体用户发货。【原文：Shares of rare earths miners rose in morning trade on Thursday after China tightened export controls on metals crucial to the weapons and electronics industries, aiming to limit shipments to overseas defense firms and semiconductor users.】

item.title: 铜价自 2024 年 5 月以来首次触及每吨 11,000 美元
item.description: 周四，铜价触及每吨 11,000 美元，这是 16 个多月来从未见过的水平，原因是铜矿大面积中断引发了对供应短缺的担忧，并吸引了投机资金流入。【原文：Copper prices hit $11,000 per metric ton on Thursday, a level not seen in over 16 months, as widespread disruption at mines sparks fears of a shortage of supply and attracts speculative inflows.】

item.title: 谷歌为企业客户推出双子座企业人工智能平台
item.description: Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司周四推出了一个面向企业客户的新人工智能平台，名为 "双子座企业"（Gemini Enterprise）。【原文：Alphabet's Google on Thursday launched a new AI platform for business customers called Gemini Enterprise, as the tech giant ramps up efforts to capture more corporate clients with its artificial intelligence tools.】

item.title: 独家报道被巨额罚款的申银万国加强内部控制
item.description: 据一封致投资者的信、内部备忘录和两位直接了解该计划的消息人士称，在线快速时尚零售商Shein在因数据隐私泄露、虚假折扣和绿色营销等问题被处以一系列罚款后，正在加强其控制措施。【原文：Online fast-fashion retailer Shein is strengthening its controls after a string of fines over data privacy breaches, fake discounts and greenwashing, according to a letter to investors, internal memos and two sources with direct knowledge of the plan.】

item.title: 特朗普兄弟支持的多米尼克控股公司获准牵头在纽约证券交易所上市
item.description: 由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的儿子们支持的多米纳利控股公司（Dominari Holdings）周四表示，其金融咨询业务已获准成为纽约证券交易所首次公开发行股票的主承销商或主要承销商。【原文：Dominari Holdings , a company backed by the sons of U.S. President Donald Trump, said on Thursday its financial advisory business has won approval to be a lead or principal underwriter for initial public offerings on the New York Stock Exchange.】

item.title: 英特尔概述利用其新型制造技术生产的首款个人电脑芯片的细节
item.description: 英特尔周四公布了其即将推出的 Panther Lake 笔记本电脑处理器的关键细节，这是其采用下一代 18A 生产工艺制造的首款芯片，旨在让投资者相信其耗资巨大的扭亏为盈计划能够恢复其制造优势。【原文：Intel on Thursday unveiled key details of its upcoming Panther Lake laptop processor, the first chip built on its next-generation 18A production process, aiming to convince investors its costly turnaround plan can restore its manufacturing edge.】

item.title: 墨西哥 9 月份年度通胀率上升，但仍在目标范围内
item.description: 周四的官方数据显示，墨西哥 9 月份的年通胀率略低于预期，但仍保持在央行 3% 的目标范围内，正负为一个百分点。【原文：Mexico's annual inflation rate quickened in September at a pace slightly below expectations, official data showed on Thursday, and remained within the central bank's target range of 3%, plus or minus a percentage point.】

item.title: 加拿大银行警告不要过度监管金融业
item.description: 作者：Promit Mukherjee 和 David Ljunggren【原文：By Promit Mukherjee and David Ljunggren】

item.title: Openbrand 称美国 9 月消费品价格上涨
item.description: OpenBrand 公司周四的数据显示，9 月份美国长期消费品和个人用品的价格上涨，尽管进口关税的提振作用似乎正在减弱。【原文：Prices for long-lasting U.S. consumer and personal goods increased in September, data from OpenBrand showed on Thursday, though the boost from import tariffs appeared to be fading.】

item.title: 印度在金融科技盛会中将加密货币和稳定币拒之门外
item.description: 在本周于孟买举行的全球最大金融技术行业会议上，800 多名发言人围绕两个全球瞩目的话题展开了讨论：加密货币和稳定币。【原文：At the world's largest gathering for the financial technology sector in Mumbai this week, more than 800 speakers tip-toed around two topics that have captured attention globally: cryptocurrencies and stablecoins.】

item.title: 雪佛龙扩展印度中心，提升数字和人工智能能力
item.description: 雪佛龙印度公司周四在班加罗尔为其工程与创新卓越中心（ENGINE）启用了一个占地 312,000 平方英尺的设施，这是该公司成立一年后，为巩固技术工作和深化数字与人工智能能力而设立的。【原文：Chevron India on Thursday opened a 312,000-square-foot facility for its Engineering and Innovation Excellence Center (ENGINE) in Bengaluru, a year after launching the unit to consolidate technical work and deepen its digital and artificial intelligence capabilities.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，欧洲央行的利率水平足以应对冲击
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）决策者周四公布的 9 月 10-11 日会议记录显示，他们并不急于再次降息，即使他们敏锐地意识到了异常严重的不确定性和风险。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers are in no hurry to cut interest rates again, even if they are keenly aware of unusually high uncertainty and risks, the accounts of their September 10-11 meeting showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 中国宣布人造钻石出口限制措施将于美国关税休战期限前一天生效
item.description: 中国周四宣布对某些类型的人造钻石实施出口限制，该限制将在中美关税休战计划结束前生效，这进一步加强了中国政府对高科技制造业供应链的控制。【原文：China on Thursday announced export curbs on some types of artificial diamonds set to take effect just before the U.S.-China tariff truce is scheduled to end, further tightening Beijing's grip over high-tech manufacturing supply chains.】

item.title: 印度最大的太阳能公司之一表示，美国市场不值得冒险
item.description: 萨特维克绿色能源公司（Saatvik Green Energy）是印度产能最大的太阳能组件制造商之一，该公司周四表示，由于棘手的关税问题，不再 "值得冒险"，该公司正在回避曾经前景广阔的美国出口市场。【原文：Saatvik Green Energy , one of India's biggest solar module makers by capacity, said on Thursday it is shunning the once-promising U.S. export market as it is no longer "worth the risk" due to the thorny tariff issue.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求强劲，Polestar 第三季度汽车销量大增
item.description: 瑞典电动汽车制造商Polestar第三季度汽车销量大增，这主要得益于欧洲本土市场的强劲需求，尽管关税和谨慎的消费支出导致宏观经济形势严峻。【原文：Polestar's third-quarter vehicle sales jumped, bolstered by resilient demand in the Swedish electric-vehicle maker's home market of Europe despite a tough macroeconomic backdrop marked by tariffs and cautious consumer spending.】

item.title: EA 锁定并加载《战地 6》，在私有化之前对抗《使命召唤
item.description: 电子艺界（Electronic Arts）希望最新的《战地》（Battlefield）游戏能做到上一部游戏所做不到的事情，即恢复该系列游戏的声誉，削弱《使命召唤》在第一人称射击游戏领域的统治地位。【原文：Electronic Arts is betting on the latest "Battlefield" title to do what the last one could not - restore the franchise's reputation and loosen the dominance of "Call of Duty" on the first-person shooter genre.】

item.title: 送货机器人公司Serve Robotics与DoorDash合作扩大业务范围
item.description: Serve Robotics 公司周四表示，它正在与 DoorDash 合作，部署其人行道机器人来完成食品配送平台上的订单，此举旨在抓住更多客户，并将其业务范围扩展到 Uber Eats 以外。【原文：Serve Robotics said on Thursday it is partnering with DoorDash to deploy its sidewalk robots to fulfill orders on the food delivery platform, in a move to capture more customers and expand its reach beyond Uber Eats.】

item.title: 早间竞价：股市暂停，泡沫警告不断升温
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 达美航空公司看好票价上涨和需求复苏前景
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）受企业差旅需求复苏和定价能力提高的影响，第三季度盈利强于预期，周四该公司对本季度的前景作出了乐观的展望。【原文：Delta Air Lines delivered an upbeat outlook for the current quarter on Thursday, after posting stronger-than-expected third-quarter earnings, buoyed by a recovery in corporate travel demand and improved pricing power.】

item.title: 第三季度交易反弹，美国银行将获得更大利润
item.description: 受投资银行业务反弹的推动，美国六大银行预计将于下周公布更强劲的第三季度财报。【原文：The six largest U.S. banks are expected to report stronger third-quarter earnings next week, catapulted by a rebound in investment banking.】

item.title: 土耳其航空公司董事长称，如果发动机谈判失败，可能将波音 737 订单转给空客
item.description: 土耳其航空公司主席艾哈迈德-博拉特（Ahmet Bolat）表示，如果与发动机供应商CFM公司的谈判未能取得进展，土耳其航空公司可能会将最近宣布的波音737 MAX喷气机订单转给竞争对手空中客车公司。【原文：Turkish Airlines could switch a recently announced order for Boeing 737 MAX jets to rival Airbus if talks with engine supplier CFM , fail to make progress, the airline's Chair Ahmet Bolat said.】

item.title: 印度 TCS 因银行业垂直业务增长，季度收入超出预期
item.description: 印度最大的软件服务出口商塔塔咨询服务公司（Tata Consultancy Services）周四公布的季度营收超过预期，这主要得益于其银行、金融服务和保险业务的增长，尽管美国与关税相关的不确定性和美国签证制度收紧带来的风险不断增加。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services , India's top software services exporter, beat quarterly revenue estimates on Thursday, aided by growth in its banking, financial services and insurance vertical despite U.S. tariff-related uncertainty and mounting risks from a tightening U.S. visa regime.】

item.title: 法拉利提升年度指导目标，将 2030 年收入目标定为 90 亿欧元
item.description: 豪华跑车制造商法拉利周四上调了其年度指导目标，并表示预计到2030年收入将达到约90亿欧元（105亿美元）。【原文：Luxury sports-car maker Ferrari on Thursday raised its annual guidance and said it expected to reach revenue of around 9 billion euros ($10.5 billion) in 2030.】

item.title: 奥托立夫与航盛电机计划成立安全电子产品合资公司，进军中国汽车市场
item.description: 瑞典汽车安全设备制造商奥托立夫公司（Autoliv）周四表示，该公司计划与中国电动汽车电子集团航盛电子组建合资企业，为中国市场生产安全电子设备。【原文：Swedish auto safety gear maker Autoliv , said on Thursday it plans to form a joint venture with Chinese electric vehicle electronics group Hangsheng Electric to make safety electronics for the Chinese market.】

item.title: 百事公司任命史蒂夫-施密特为首席财务官
item.description: 百事公司（PepsiCo）周四任命史蒂夫-施密特（Steve Schmitt）为新任首席财务官，接替公司资深财务官杰米-考菲尔德（Jamie Caulfield），自 11 月 10 日起生效。【原文：PepsiCo on Thursday named Steve Schmitt as its new chief financial officer, effective November 10, replacing company veteran Jamie Caulfield.】

item.title: 诺和诺德将以不超过 52 亿美元的价格收购 Akero Therapeutics
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）周四表示，已同意以不超过52亿美元的价格收购Akero Therapeutics公司，从而使这家丹麦制药商获得这家美国公司的肝病实验药物。【原文：Novo Nordisk said on Thursday it had agreed to buy Akero Therapeutics for up to $5.2 billion, giving the Danish drugmaker access to the U.S.-based company's experimental liver disease drug.】
